briefdescription.para: acquire/release D3D lock (to perform rendering in non-primary thread)
acquire/release a mutex to perform resource loading in non-primary thread and postpone GPU resets, the lock is nonexclusive.
Gets CPU and GPU time nearly at the same moment.
flush pipeline states to compile pipeline

detaileddescription.para: Returns video memory budget in KiByte values par1: pointer to uint32_t: Total memory budget on the device, possibly less than physical memory of the device par2: pointer to uint32_t: Free memory budget on the device, this is *par1 minus used memory par3: pointer to uint32_t: Used memory, this is *par1 minus *par2 Return: uint32_t: Physical memory of the device
